address.postal: nVision Creative Hub, PO Box 1999, Zomba

grantFocus.grantBrief:
Looking to support exemplary students currently studying computer engineering.
Our offer includes a mandatory internship at our facilities.
grantRequirements:
1. Creative, Motivated and Self-driven personnel
2. Knowledgeable in any programming language. Preferably C or Python but not mandatory.
3. Good english skills
4. Able to work in a team environment
